subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=62|rad=戈|as=10|sn=14|four=|canj=MII|ids=⿰[[辱]][[戈]]}}

# a [[lance]] with [[two]] [[point]]s, a [[halberd]] with a [[crescent]]-[[shape]]d [[blade]]
# [[weapon]]s used in [[ancient]] [[time]]s
# [[stimulate]], [[provoke]], [[excite]], [[irritate]]
# to [[point]] with the [[index finger]] and the [[middle finger]]
# to [[describe]] [[angry]] or an [[awe]]-[[inspiring]] [[display]] of [[military]] [[force]], etc.
# [[masculine]], [[heroic]], [[brave]]
# (in general) [[sharp]] points and [[edge]]s of weapons
